creator: Tom.Donovan@acm.org
text:
Makefile.win includes references to devenv starting with 2.2.6.

The Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 "Express" Edition (i.e. the free edition) does not
include the devenv utility.  This makes it difficult to build Apache with this
edition of VC.

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
only if there are .sln files present, if it finds .mak files those will always
take precedence.  (this is for -win32-src.zip distributions, ignore all others.)
